_header: In Rome was once a rich man / That hight forsooth Euphemian
Subjects: Alexius, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Alexius, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
In Rome was anes a riche maneþat hight forsothe
                    eufemyane…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…And lene vs so oure liue to ledeþat we mai all haue
                    heuene to mede
BodAsh42.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 174-88.
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULGg531.First Lines:
In Rome was ones a ryche maneHys name was haten
                    Eufemyan…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Þai may be seker of heuen medeOur lord vs blys and
                    þeder vs lede
CULGg531.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 174-88.

HunHM129.First Lines:
In rome wos onys aryche manÞat heygh Sir
                    Ewfemyan…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And gyfe vs gras oure liffe to ledeÞat we may þare
                    take oure mede
